amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to undertake a management reform initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-229 to direct the Secretary of HHS to undergo a management reform initiative. Requires HHS to utilize an outside management consulting firm to recommend and support the implementation of internal reforms to improve the Head Start Bureau's operational effectiveness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Mica.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
